message.name: RUN_SIMPLE_TYPES_ONLY
message.locale: Only simple type definitions are allowed at global level

message.name: RUN_SINGLE_OPTIONS_ELEMENT
message.locale: 'appinfo' must contain only a single 'options' element (from BaseDomains schema)

message.name: RUN_OPTION_NAME_AND_SIMPLE_CONTENT
message.locale: 'options' must contain only option elements have name attributes and simple content

message.name: RUN_CONFLICTING_CONSTRAINTS
message.locale: Conflicting annotated constraint and constraining facet

message.name: RUN_CODE_TABLE_INHERIT
message.locale: Code table domain must inherit from a code table root domain

message.name: RUN_NEED_CODE_TABLE_NAME
message.locale: Domain must specify a code table name

message.name: RUN_MULTIPLE_NAMESPACES
message.locale: Datastore schema must defined in a single namespace but multiple were encountered. (Check that you are not inheriting from a built-in type instead of base domain)

message.name: RUN_ENCLOSING_TYPE
message.locale: Element must not have enclosing type definition

message.name: RUN_COMPOSITOR_MUST_BE_SEQUENCE
message.locale: Complex type compositor must be sequence

message.name: RUN_SEQUENCE_ITEMS_ELEMENTS
message.locale: Sequence items must be element declarations

message.name: RUN_ATTRIBUTE_IN_NAMESPACE
message.locale: Attribute must not be in a namespace

message.name: RUN_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE_DOMAIN
message.locale: Attribute type is not a valid domain (simpleType) definition

message.name: RUN_SVR_KEY
message.locale: Attribute of type SVR_KEY is not referenced by any key or keyref
